title: Timesheet to be approved from the dashboard
content: The Emprez dashboard allows you to understand what's going on in your account at a glance.Timesheets are classified:By pay periodPer employee, with the number of timesheets to be approved in parenthesesStart approving timesheets from the Dashboard:Select the employees or employees to display,Click on Approve,Or click Today or Yesterday to hide the other dates in the period.You can also view the timesheets in the Timesheets menu. To learn more, click here.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
